text_block_list.text:
Teio-san! This time, can you run with me please?! 
I want to see how far I can go— at least once!!!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, give me your best shot, Kita-chan! I'll show 
you how amazing the Uma Musume you look up to really is～!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: She accepted the challenge. And so-

Haaaaaaaaa, more… I need to run more!! 
As many tens or hundreds of times it takes!!!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
I need to make good use of this strength of mine, 
it's the only thing I have! Kuu… Haa… Deyaaaa!!!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
With Kitasan Black's tremendous toughness, she never 
faltered in her absurd training. Far from wavering, 
her fighting spirit burned even brighter-

Haa, haa, haa, slope running… I need to do at least 3 times as 
much as other girls… I can keep going, I'm not done yet…
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
choice_data_list: <size=33>How many more do you plan to do, Kitasan Black?</size>
<size=33>How many more do you plan to do, Kitasan Black?</size>

text_block_list.text:
As many as it takes. As many as I can. Until I drop. 
Teio-san is going to run with me. If she's going to then…!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
I want to win! I really want to win! To make the most of this one 
chance, and show them something amazing, to make them all smile!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
No, there's no guarantee they'll come to see me… 
but… even still… there's one person I want to make smile-
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
It's obvious…! The person who did everything 
they could to get me to this point, Trainer-san!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
The person I'm most indebted to! At the very least, I want that 
person to smile! If it's for that, more — I can do even more—!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Before, Kitasan Black had talked about her dream. "Just like my 
dad, someone who can grant courage and spirit, that's the kind 
of Uma Musume I want to be".

Kitasan Black is betting everything on this, to take one big step 
forward. It's her one chance. Betting on this "Festival", with 
passion as bright as any fireworks…

Trainer-san, please!! My strength, my one and only trait-!! 
Make it stronger than anyone—!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
choice_data_list: Yeah, I got it. Let's do it!
Yeah, I got it. Let's do it!

text_block_list.text:
We were already in sync. Doing every kind of training we could 
think of with the highest intensity, making full use of her 
stamina and willpower, from dawn until dusk-
And then — The fated day arrived.
Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Eh, Kita-chan… a start dash?! Normally you don't care about 
getting out front though. Did your trainer tell you to escape?
text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond

text_block_list.text: -No, this isn't an escape. This is…!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
(This is- my strength! What I polished up with Trainer-san, 
a sudden breakout "First-strike Lead"!)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
(By forcefully pulling the rate of this race up, as long as I'm 
not exhausted, I'll win! I will dictate the pacing in this race!)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
(Haa, haa, kuu, haaa…!! The last… straight…! 
If I can hold it together heeeeere…)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
(But… Teio-san is keeping up?! On top of that she doesn't look 
very tired?! Which means… a contest of speed…)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Is this it for you?! In that case! I'll be moving ahead! 
Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Aaaah, she's pulling ahead…!
text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond

text_block_list.text:
I guess it can't be helped, her opponent is Teio-san 
after all. On top of that, turning it in to head-to-head 
battle, then her chance of winning…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
(Stamina… I can still keep going… But, I can't 
increase my speed any more than this… I can't 
win, I can't win, I can't win…)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
(Again… I couldn't… Even though I worked so hard… 
is this the way… it's going… to end?)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Time — seemed to slow. No matter how hard she struggles 
she won't win. At the moment when all hope seemed 
lost, something came welling up within.

"You can keep going!! Your toughness isn't just for show!!" 
That conviction — was put in to words.

"You can keep going!! Your toughness isn't just for show!!" 
That conviction — was put in to words.

(Trainer-san…! Someone as hopeless as me, 
you trained me up to this point…!)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
(Will this end without me repaying the favor…? All of this 
time… all of these feelings… will I make them worthless…?)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
(I wont… let that happen. It won't happen. 
If I let it happen—)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text: I won't— I won't be me!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
I won't let you pull aheeeeead!!!!!!! 
Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text: Eh?! Eeeeeeehh?!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text:
This is… what just happened?! 
A speed surpassing Teio-san?! Right here at the end?!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahh!!!!!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Ah, that was close…!! I seriously thought you 
were going to push all the way through to the end…!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text:
Hehee, looks like I barely made it. Not bad, Kita-chan. 
But, I won't let you beat me that easily.
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text: Kuuuuuuu!!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text: U-uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaan!!!!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text: Eeeh… Kita-chan?!
text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio

text_block_list.text:
Daaaaaaaaaaaaaaamnit!!!!! 
Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaan!!!!!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Everyone was surprised by the sudden tears, but I understood. 
Kitasan Black wasn't just a really sincere, good person.

A passion, second to none, was hidden in that heart 
of hers. Her dream wasn't just pretty words, it burned 
hundreds or thousands of times brighter…

Trainer-san, I… I… 
I wasn't able to make anyone smile!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
But… I won't give up. I don't want to give up! 
Next time, next time for sure—!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Yes, please…!! From now on, and on, 
and on and on!! As my official trainer, until the end!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
First I need to make Trainer-san smile! After that everyone! 
And after that even more!! More and more people!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
A never-yielding Kitasan Black, overflowing with 
potential, stood there trembling. It's possible… that 
I slightly misunderstood her.

I had thought that Kitasan Black's number one trait was her 
"Toughness". Maybe— it was what she just showed in the race, 
the explosive power of her spirit.

Maybe, her strongest trait was- 
"The power to do her best for someone", perhaps.

That was… absolutely stunning. A fervor strong enough 
to change those around her… Someone like that is our kouhai.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Fufu, looks like you're just getting started. Kita-chan.
text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond

text_block_list.text:
You found it, didn't you? Someone important to you. 
From now on, both of us will-!
text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
